The menu features shareable and thoughtfully sourced dishes from local purveyors. Featured Recipes Frannie & The Fox invites you to try a few of our favorite recipes at home. Learn more > Close Notice Large Parties & Private Dining Impress Your Guests: Exceptional Events at Frannie Whether a corporate dinner, family gathering, or a more intimate affair, host your special occasion at Frannie & The Fox. Our private dining room fits up to 30 guests for intimate events looking for the flexibility of a restaurant with the high touch advance planning of a catered event. Southern Hospitality at Frannie's Frannie & The Fox is the consummate host and offers unique group dining experiences with fully customizable menus. Our private and semi-private indoor spaces pair perfectly with our Chefâ€™s catering menus, plus our exceptional service for private affairs served with a side of Southern hospitality. Note: Private and semi-private spaces are subject to availability. A contract and deposit may be required for larger events. Plan Your Special Event Today Chef Curated Private Dining Menus Frannie & The Fox Chefs have created menus perfect for corporate dinners, family gatherings, and any reason you may find a dedicated room all to yourself. Note: Custom menus require 72-hour notice. RESERVATIONS Reservations recommended 181 Church Street Charleston, SC 29401 843.577.2644 CONTACT For the adventure seeking, campfire loving, culinary enthusiast in us all, Frannie & The Fox presents a wood burning concept of shareable dishes. Whether youâ€™re a guest of the Holy City or a Charlestonian, you will find a warm and engaging environment anytime. Our courtyard and adjacent greenhouse offer open-air dining in a gardenesque vibe and are perfect for special occasions.
